name: Cloud&Heat Technologies GmbH
goal:
Cloud&Heat Technologies builds, runs and manages data centers all over the world and maintains the world’s greenest and most secure data centers, for a wide range of businesses.



Our hardware data center solutions are complemented by integrating customized software infrastructures, all operated and maintained by the Cloud&Heat team.

We are also dedicated to building and managing private and public cloud infrastructures with our energy-efficient hardware and highly experienced management, based on Open-Infrastructures.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
